textclip.sh→URL gen: #t=<txt>→copy page | ?ask=<preset>#t=→svc redirect | ?redirect=<url>#t=→custom(use __TEXT__ placeholder). presets∈{claude,chatgpt,perplexity,gemini,google,bing,kagi,duckduckgo,brave,ecosia,wolfram}. len>500→auto deflate-raw #c= base64url encoded, efficient≤16k tokens. custom redirect→local LLM|any ?param svc. view mode: txt display+copy btn+new clip btn; copy→clipboard API→"Copied!" feedback 2s. create mode: textarea+live counters{chars,~tokens(len/4),url len}; color warn: tokens≥8k→yellow,≥16k→red; url≥7k→yellow,≥10k→red. badge gen: shields.io md [!alt](target_url); cfg{label?,msg="copy_prompt",labelBg="555",msgBg="252421",style∈[flat,flat-square,plastic,for-the-badge]}; link target∈{copy,preset,custom}; preset→msg="ask_<name>". redirect flow: page loads→decompress if #c=→detect ?ask|?redirect→window.location.href=svc_url?param=encodeURI(txt). hosted: cloudflare pages, 0 backend, all client-side. use case: README "ask AI" 1-click buttons, shareable prompts, docs integration. this prompt likely∈textclip.sh preset delivery.

Visit textclip.sh for more details
